name: part_009
file: tmp_【#大空スバル４周年】新衣装お披露目！！！！！４周年ありがとうございました！！！！！！！！：NEW 3D COSTUME !!! 4th anniversary Live【ホロライブ】 [n6yep2gl1HY]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Oozora Subaru performs the song "Q&A Recital!" during her 4th-anniversary 3D live concert.
Subaru finishes the performance, catches her breath, and addresses the audience.

subtitles.original: 今日もこの胸は 張りつめたまま
subtitles.english: Today as well, my heart remains tight

subtitles.original: 放課後に包まれて 君を見てる lady-ready?
subtitles.english: Wrapped in the after-school atmosphere, I'm watching you. Lady-ready?

subtitles.original: ずっと足並みは 揃わないまま
subtitles.english: Our steps remain out of sync

subtitles.original: 続くから内緒だよ 少しつめて lady-ready?
subtitles.english: It'll keep going, so it's a secret. Move a little closer. Lady-ready?

subtitles.original: 知りすぎて知らないから
subtitles.english: I know too much, so I don't know

subtitles.original: 聞こえないふりが上手に なって
subtitles.english: I've gotten good at pretending I can't hear

subtitles.original: 深呼吸ひとつしたら目を開けて
subtitles.english: Take one deep breath and open your eyes

subtitles.original: 自問自答やめて 何気なく「おはよう」なんて言っちゃってる
subtitles.english: Stop the self-questioning and find myself casually saying "Good morning"

subtitles.original: ハイ! ハイ!
subtitles.english: Hey! Hey!

subtitles.original: 呆れるくらい全部君が欲しいよ ハートは涙でいっぱい
subtitles.english: I want all of you to an exasperating degree. My heart is full of tears.

subtitles.original: 恋のいろはとかまだ分かってないんだ
subtitles.english: I still don't understand the basics of love

subtitles.original: 何度も繰り返すけど寸前でまた次回へ
subtitles.english: I repeat it over and over, but right before the end, it's "to be continued"

subtitles.original: スウィートな乙女心はあいにく取り扱ってないのです
subtitles.english: Unfortunately, this sweet maidenly heart isn't something I handle.

subtitles.original: ねぇ、これがアイ・ラブ・ユー
subtitles.english: Hey, this is "I love you"

subtitles.original: やっと手に入れた はずのパノラマ
subtitles.english: The panorama I was supposed to have finally gotten

subtitles.original: 2歩進み2歩下がる なんでだっけ lady-ready?
subtitles.english: Two steps forward, two steps back. Why was that? Lady-ready?

subtitles.original: ゴールできなくちゃ 止まれないから
subtitles.english: If I can't reach the goal, I can't stop

subtitles.original: 分からないままでもね いいよ だから lady-ready?
subtitles.english: It's okay even if I don't understand, so... lady-ready?

subtitles.original: 昨日の答えなんてさ
subtitles.english: Yesterday's answer...

subtitles.original: 今日の答えの前では ほらね
subtitles.english: Is nothing before today's answer, see?

subtitles.original: もう勝てそうもないくらい好きだから
subtitles.english: Because I love you so much I can't possibly win anymore

subtitles.original: 知らないことはいつか知れたらいいなって言っちゃおうかな
subtitles.english: Maybe I'll just say, "It'd be nice if I could find out the things I don't know someday"

subtitles.original: ハイ! ハイ!
subtitles.english: Hey! Hey!

subtitles.original: 取り留めないシーンでも大事だからね アンダーラインを引いて
subtitles.english: Even random scenes are important, so draw an underline

subtitles.original: 恋の試験科目に加えておいてよ
subtitles.english: Add them to the subjects of the love exam

subtitles.original: 時々に君の心に何百マイルのディスタンス?
subtitles.english: Sometimes, how many hundreds of miles of distance are in your heart?

subtitles.original: なんてね 気にしすぎかな だけどそれが本心なのです
subtitles.english: Just kidding, am I worrying too much? But those are my true feelings.

subtitles.original: こんなあんな時はどうしたらいいの?
subtitles.english: What should I do in times like this or that?

subtitles.original: 慣れたメロディを口ずさむように
subtitles.english: Like humming a familiar melody

subtitles.original: 君の中の私はどこにいるの?
subtitles.english: Where am I inside of you?

subtitles.original: ぐるぐる回って 四六時中リサイタル
subtitles.english: Round and round, a recital 24/7

subtitles.original: ス・バ・ル! ス・バ・ル! L・O・V・E ス・バ・ル!
subtitles.english: SU-BA-RU! SU-BA-RU! L-O-V-E SU-BA-RU!

subtitles.original: ス・バ・ル! ス・バ・ル! L・O・V・E ス・バ・ル!
subtitles.english: SU-BA-RU! SU-BA-RU! L-O-V-E SU-BA-RU!

subtitles.original: さて ありありありあ せんでぃっと
subtitles.english: Well, Ari-ari-ari-a send it

subtitles.original: Someday I really really send it precious for you!
subtitles.english: Someday I really really send it precious for you!

subtitles.original: さて ありありありあ せんでぃっと
subtitles.english: Well, Ari-ari-ari-a send it

subtitles.original: いつかその日が来たら 大切な声を聞いて
subtitles.english: When that day finally comes, listen to my precious voice

subtitles.original: 恋に予約録画はありえないから 逃さないで
subtitles.english: There's no such thing as scheduled recording for love, so don't miss it

subtitles.original: 呆れるくらい全部君が好きだよ ハートは笑顔でいっぱい
subtitles.english: I love all of you to an exasperating degree. My heart is full of smiles.

subtitles.original: 恋のいろはも少し分かりたいんだ
subtitles.english: I want to understand the basics of love a little more

subtitles.original: 何度も繰り返すけど寸前でまた次回へ
subtitles.english: I repeat it over and over, but right before the end, it's "to be continued"

subtitles.original: スウィートな乙女心は依然取り扱ってないのです
subtitles.english: I'm still not handling this sweet maidenly heart.

subtitles.original: ねぇ、これがアイ・ラブ・ユー
subtitles.english: Hey, this is "I love you"

subtitles.original: Precious for you!
subtitles.english: Precious for you!

subtitles.original: さて ありありありあ せんでぃっと
subtitles.english: Well, Ari-ari-ari-a send it

subtitles.original: Precious for you!
subtitles.english: Precious for you!

subtitles.original: さて ありありありあ せんでぃっと
subtitles.english: Well, Ari-ari-ari-a send it

subtitles.original: Precious for you!
subtitles.english: Precious for you!

subtitles.original: さて ありありありあ せんでぃっと
subtitles.english: Well, Ari-ari-ari-a send it

subtitles.original: Precious for you!
subtitles.english: Precious for you!

subtitles.original: さて ありありありあ せんでぃっと
subtitles.english: Well, Ari-ari-ari-a send it

subtitles.original: はい! ということで Q&Aリサイタルでした!
subtitles.english: Yes! And that was Q&A Recital!

subtitles.original: うわぁぁ!
subtitles.english: Waaaa!

subtitles.original: ちょっとね 本当にいっぱーい頑張ったから、ちょっと待って
subtitles.english: Give me a sec, I really worked super hard, so just a moment

subtitles.original: うー、ふー
subtitles.english: Whew...
